name: cert.one-backend
description: Blockchain certificate generator with OpenTimestamps and IPFS integration

scripts.install-chrome: apt-get update && apt-get install -y wget gnupg ca-certificates && wget -q -O - https://dl-ssl.google.com/linux/linux_signing_key.pub | apt-key add - && echo 'deb [arch=amd64] http://dl.google.com/linux/chrome/deb/ stable main' >> /etc/apt/sources.list.d/google.list && apt-get update && apt-get install -y google-chrome-stable --no-install-recommends && rm -rf /var/lib/apt/lists/*

author: JOHNJOHNFM, LLC
